com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std

Class StdPolicyFinderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.PolicyFinderFactory
      • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std.StdPolicyFinderFactory

  • public class StdPolicyFinderFactory
extends PolicyFinderFactory
    StdPolicyFinderFactory extends PolicyFinderFactory with the getPolicyFinder method to get a single instance of the StdPolicyFinder. The root PolicyDef is loaded from a file whose name is specified as a system property or in the $java.home/lib/xacml.properties property set.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    car
